Package insurancemodel

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Address
    Class to handle and manage the addresses of the Policy Holders.
    BuildingPolicy
    This is a class to create and control all building insurance policies.
    CarPolicy
    This is class to create and control all vehicle insurance policies.
    ClientDetails
    This class represents the details of each individual client; involving data relevant to a particular client only.
    ClientDetailsList
    This class contains an ArrayList of type ClientDetails, that holds all the information related to the clients of the insurance company that was retrieved from the InputData class.
    ContentPolicy
    This is a class to create and control all content insurance policies.
    InputData
    The purpose of this class is to read in and manipulate the text file using the Scanner class.
    InsuranceCoDemo  
    LifePolicy
    This is a class to create and control all life insurance policies.
    Name  
    Policy
    This is an abstract class containing two fields, policyNo and policyYear.
    PolicyList
    The PolicyList Class is used to represent a collection of Policy objects.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalPolicyException
    Class to handle exceptions.
